ygData.subject: Re: The rescue attempt
ygData.msgSnippet: Doc followed, ready to aim his sniper at the bot in case this degenerated. Dinobot was still debating about his next move. He could still keep the upper hand,

Doc followed, ready to aim his sniper at the bot in case this degenerated.
=

Dinobot was still debating about his next move. He could still keep
the up=
per hand, but would that be honorable? There were honorable ways
to manage =
that, though... A plan was forming. Somehow, Trelos was
going farther and f=
arther back on his priority list.
